# DynamicGenerationSchema.Property

**Structure**

A property that belongs to a dynamic generation schema.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Property
```

## Overview

Fields are named members of object types. Fields are strongly typed and have optional descriptions.

## Creating a property

- **init(name:description:schema:isOptional:)**: Creates a property referencing a dynamic schema.

## Creating a dynamic schema

- **init(arrayOf:minimumElements:maximumElements:)**: Creates an array schema.
- **init(name:description:anyOf:)**: Creates an any-of schema.
- **init(name:description:properties:)**: Creates an object schema.
- **init(referenceTo:)**: Creates an refrence schema.
- **init(type:guides:)**: Creates a schema from a generable type and guides.
